thread.title: Ralph Lauren goes barefoot, breezy, beachside for latest collection

title: Ralph Lauren goes barefoot, breezy, beachside for latest collection
text:
Ralph Lauren goes barefoot, breezy, beachside for latest collection 3:01am IST - 01:02 
The veteran designer evokes the Caribbean spirit in his latest collection filled with colorful sundresses, shorts and sweaters. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
